abstract: UBS’s investment banking arm said it hired Bora Sila, who spent 19 years at Citigroup, as a managing director and head of its retail coverage in the Americas.
snippet: UBS’s investment banking arm said it hired Bora Sila, who spent 19 years at Citigroup, as a managing director and head of its retail coverage in the Americas.
lead_paragraph: UBS‘s investment banking arm said it hired Bora Sila, who spent 19 years at Citigroup, as a managing director and head of its retail coverage in the Americas.

headline.main: UBS Hires Top Retail Banker From Citi
